Package evs.utilities.mathutil

Math utility classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DoubleDoubleFunction Interface that represents a function object: a function that takes two arguments and returns a single value.
DoubleDoubleProcedure Interface that represents a procedure object: a procedure that takes two arguments and does not return a value.
DoubleFunction Interface that represents a function object: a function that takes a single, double valued, argument and returns a single value.
DoubleOperation Highest level of function that operates on doubles.
DoubleProcedure Interface that represents a logical procedure on a double value.
Function Interface that represents a function object for performing calculations on numeric data.
ObjectFunction Interface that represents a function object: a function that takes a single object argument and returns a single object value.
VectorDoubleProcedure Interface representing a function that applies a double procedure to a vector and returns a boolean value.
VectorFunction Interface that represents a vector function, which takes a 1D matrix argument and returns a double value.
 

Class Summary
EmpiricalCDFCalculator Utility class for empirical probability distributions.
FunctionLibrary IMPORTANT: WHEN ADDING NEW FUNCTIONS, ENSURE THEY ARE ACCESSIBLE TO THE GENERIC METHODS GETUNARYFUNCTION(), GETBINARYFUNCTION() ETC.
Mathematics Class for common mathematical operations.
MersenneTwister MersenneTwister and MersenneTwisterFast
 

Package evs.utilities.mathutil Description

Math utility classes.
